definitions.text: a wild primitive state untouched by civilization
examples: they collected mushrooms in the wild

definitions.text: a wild and uninhabited area left in its natural condition
examples: it was a wilderness preserved for the hawks and mountaineers

definitions.text: marked by extreme lack of restraint or control
in a natural state; not tamed or domesticated or cultivated
in a state of extreme emotion
deviating widely from an intended course
(of colors or sounds) intensely vivid or loud
examples: her dress was a violent red

definitions.text: without a basis in reason or fact

examples: extremely risky going out in the tide and fog
a fantastic idea of his own importance

definitions.text: located in a dismal or remote area; desolate
intensely enthusiastic about or preoccupied with

examples: fighting is crude and uncivilized especially if the weapons are efficient

definitions.text: (of the elements) as if showing violent anger
in an uncontrolled and rampant manner
in a wild or undomesticated manner
